data.title: Archives by theme
data.meta_description: The Welsh Political Archive includes collections on many different themes from devolution to elections to the Welsh language
data.text:
Library Catalogue

The National Library of Wales’s collections are at your fingertips. Search through our vast collections and order material to view in the Reading Room.

Discover our range of resources available

Maps Collection

See how our perception of Wales has changed. From some of the oldest maps of Wales to stunning local hand-drawn maps and everything in between. Maps are our gateway to the past.

Discover our map collection

Weddings

Did you know that you can get married at the Library? With elegant rooms and stunning view over Cardigan Bay, it’s the perfect location.

Getting married at the Library

Exhibitions

Visit some of the free exhibitions at our building in Aberystwyth, and see our collections come to life.

Visit our exhibitions

Volunteering

The National Library of Wales’s collections are at your fingertips. Search through our vast collections and order material to view in the Reading Room.

Become a volunteer

Support us by donating

Preserving the Nation’s Memory

The Library was established with donations given by the people of Wales, and together we can continue that tradition. Donate to ensure our heritage for future generations. All gifts will make a real difference.
